87350.「<pc>さんが お持ちのスキルブックは\n <%nc_book>冊のようですね:
I see that you have <%dc_book> Skill Book(s).
Would you be willing to give them to me?
<yesno><break>

87351.「おや……。<pc>さんは スキルブックを\n お持ちでないようですね。\n<b:
Hmm...it doesn't look like you have any Skill Books at the moment.
Skill Books are scattered all around the world. If you bring them to me, I will exchange them for Master Skill Points.

87352.「では しばし お待ちください……。: Please give me just a moment...

87353.<se_nots Joutyu_SE 80>\nスキルマスターが目を閉じ 祈りを:
<se_nots Joutyu_SE 80>
When the Skill Master closed his eyes and
prayed, the Skill Book was consumed by
white flames and disappeared into nothing...
<wait=1300>

87354.「もう行かれるのですね。\n <pc>さんに ダーマの加護が\n あらんことを…:
I see you're leaving. May the blessings of
Alltrades be with you, <if_woman>Ms.<else>Mr.<endif> <pc>.

87356.「これで <pc>さんの身体に\n 新たなる力が宿りました。\n<br>\n「マ:
You are now in the possession of a new kind of power, Ms.Mr. .
If you want to use your Master Skill Points, talk to me and select "Allocate Master Skills".
You can also allocate points at a priest in any region.

87357.マスタースキルポイントが <%sc_point>Ｐ 戻った！: <%sc_point> Master Skill Point(s) have been returned!

87358.「スキルブックは 世界各地に散らばっており\n そもそも 数える程しか 存在して:
Skill Books are scattered all around the world, and are so rare that only a few exist.
If you bring me any Skill Books, I will give you Master Skill Points.

87359.「マスタースキルポイントとは\n 職業ごとに配分され ポイントの振り直しも\n:
Master Skill Points are special skill points that can be assigned per vocation, and can be freely reassigned at will.
I can reallocate them for you, or you can also do it at a priest in any region.
In addition, each skill line of a vocation can have its own Master Skill Points assigned.
Be aware that even if multiple vocations have the same skill lines, they still need to be assigned independently, so be careful.
Make sure to not only allocate points in your current vocations, but other vocations as well.

87360.スキルポイントの 振り分けを中止します。\nよろしいですか？<yesno 2><:
You want to cancel the allocation of your
skill points?<yesno 2><close>

87361.この状態で マスタースキルを反映しますか？\n<color_yellow><%s:
Do you want your current Master Skill Point
to be copied?<color_yellow>*This will only be copied to <%sM_job>.
Each vocation has its own assignment.
<yesno><close>

<select_se_off>
Assign Master Skills
Give Skill Books
Explanation
<select_end><break>
